body:
My guess is that you don't have the latest version of Radiance.  If "rtrace -version" doesn't return "RADIANCE 4.1" or later, then  you need to download more recent binaries or recompile from source.  Rob Guglielmetti just posted the locations of binaries for various systems.  You should grab one of those.


Best,
-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2012-July/008741.html).</sup>
